$AAPL I'm no old yet, but been here since 1984. I guess I sound old, but I'm 53.  Someone gifted me 500 shares at that time. So many years went by and I was about to sell so many times. So many people told me to including financial advisors and brokers. I'm so glad I didn't because my kids are so fucking expensive. You can play this or buy the dips.  I'm buying the dips, even if it's 5 to 20 shares.  U really can't go wrong here IMO. Nothing but excellence.  At this point, I realized this,  If things go wrong at this point, I will check to see  if the sun rises tomorrow. This is  Not investment advice but what is common is generally common.😊
